alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 2:50PM MST until March 11 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts upwards of 30 inches. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
